title: Ming Dynasty: From Xu Family’S Scorn To Ascension Through Battle!
alternative_title: Daming: Kaiju Xu Jia Chaofeng, Wo Sha Di Shengji ; Daming: Ridiculed by Xu Family at the Beginning, I Killed My Enemies to Level Up ; Ming Dynasty: From Xu Family's Scorn to Ascension Through Battle! ; The God of Killers in the Ming Dynasty ; Dàmíng: Kāijú Xú Jiā Cháofèng, Wǒ Shā Dí Shēngjí ; Ming Dynasty: From Xu Family’s Scorn to Ascension Through Battle! ; 大明：开局徐家嘲讽，我杀敌升级
status: Daming: Kaiju Xu Jia Chaofeng, Wo Sha Di Shengji ; Daming: Ridiculed by Xu Family at the Beginning, I Killed My Enemies to Level Up ; Ming Dynasty: From Xu Family's Scorn to Ascension Through Battle! ; The God of Killers in the Ming Dynasty ; Dàmíng: Kāijú Xú Jiā Cháofèng, Wǒ Shā Dí Shēngjí ; Ming Dynasty: From Xu Family’s Scorn to Ascension Through Battle! ; 大明：开局徐家嘲讽，我杀敌升级
description:
Description :
        Zhu Xiong was reborn in a small town within Beiping territory during the early years of the Ming Dynasty.In this significant year, Zhu Yuanzhang, the founding emperor, was in his prime.With Crown Prince Zhu Biao by his side, he rectified the laws and discipline of the imperial court, and consolidated the territories.During the same period, Zhu Xiong has been living for two years with the woman he saved, Xu Jin’er. They dream of running the tavern left by his grandmother and living an ordinary life together.However, this year takes a dramatic turn when Xu Jin’er’s family arrives, revealing that she is actually the daughter of Xu Da, a founding duke of the nation!This revelation brings honor and unexpected challenges as the Xu family brothers seek her, bringing disgrace upon them.
